description:
This app is a collection of rhymes and poems for children.

It contains 30 kids rhymes and poems:
1. Mice
2. The Fox and the Goat
3. Here Is My Turtle
4. The Fox and the Crane
5. To Market, To Market
6. Good Morning
7. Four Seasons
8. Wind Song
9. I Have a Lion
10. Baa, Baa, Black Sheep
11. Monkey, Mokey. What Are You Doing?
12. I'm a Lion
13. Eeny, Meeny, Miny, Mo
14. The Father, His Son, and Their Donkey
15. What Do You Do?
16. Five Little Mice
17. I Will Be Your Friend
18. All by Myself
19. The Golden Ax
20. Cows
21. Mommy, Mommy
22. If I Were a Bird
23. Five Funny Frogs
24. The Eensy Weensy Spider
25. Nap Time Is Over
26. In the Farmyard
27. The Farmer
28. Call the Dog
29. Little Deer
30. Thank You, Thank You, Thank You

Features:
30 English Children's rhymes and poems with Animation, Voice & Music.
Flick left to open next poetry.
Flick right to open prev poetry.
Click Play button on the left bottom to start reading poetry.
Click Stop button on the left bottom to stop reading poetry.
Click Home button on the right bottom to go to the list.
Tested by my 3 years old son, and he loves it.
